Module com.example.breakout_clone
Package com.example.breakout_clone.controller.game

Class DebugController

java.lang.Object
com.example.breakout_clone.controller.game.DebugController
public class DebugController extends Object
The controller class for the debug window. This class is instantiated automatically when the debug view is created. The class has been renamed from DebugPanel to DebugController to easily identify controller classes.
Author:
Praket Chavan - modified

    • setModel

      private void setModel​(GameModel model) throws Exception
      Set the current GameModel object to the parameter passed
      Parameters:
      model - The GameModel object that is to be linked to this controller It cannot be null.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the model object passed is null
      See Also:
      getModel()

    • getResetBalls

    • getSkipLevel

      public javafx.scene.control.Button getSkipLevel()
      Gets the Skip Level button object associated with the view
      Returns:
      the Button object

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      This method is called automatically when the view is created. It initialises the model object, and adds the listeners to the Slider objects from the view

    • onCompleteClick

      private void onCompleteClick()
      This method is called when the Complete Game button is pressed. It creates the GameEndView and finished the game.
      See Also:
      GameEndController

    • resetBall

      private void resetBall()
      This method is called when the Reset Ball Button is pressed. It calls the gameReset method of the linked GameModel

    • setBallXSpeed

      private void setBallXSpeed()
      This method is called when there is a change in the Ball X Speed slider value. It calls the setBallXSpeed method of the linked model and passes the new slider value as an argument
      See Also:
      GameModel.setBallXSpeed(double)

    • setBallYSpeed

      private void setBallYSpeed()
      This method is called when there is a change in the Ball Y Speed slider value. It calls the setBallYSpeed method of the linked model and passes the new slider value as an argument
      See Also:
      GameModel.setBallYSpeed(double)

    • skipLevel

      private void skipLevel()
      This method is called when the SkipLevel Button is pressed It only skips the level if there are more level to be played. If no more levels are available it does nothing. If more levels are available it calls the nextLevel method of the model and also changes the game level music to the next track
      See Also:
      GameModel.nextLevel(), GameModel.getLevelSound(), GameModel.setLevelSound(MediaPlayer), ResourceHandler.getSoundResource(String)
